name: Citrus Sunrise Latte
description: Bright citrus notes blended with creamy espresso and steamed milk — a refreshing morning pick-me-up.

name: Lavender Honey Tea
description: A calming herbal infusion with floral lavender and a touch of local honey — perfect for winding down.

name: Focus Grain Bowl
description: Protein-rich grains, roasted vegetables, and a zesty tahini dressing to keep you focused and energized.

name: Chocolate Ember Cake
description: Decadent dark chocolate slice with a warm molten center — ideal for cozy, romantic moments.

name: Masala Chai
description: Spiced Indian tea brewed with milk and aromatic masala — comforting and warm.

name: Tandoori Paneer Bowl
description: Smoky tandoori-marinated paneer with spiced grains and raita — savory and satisfying.

name: Cold Coffee
description: Mini butter chicken sandwiches with a creamy tomato sauce — a fusion favorite.

name: Gulab Jamun
description: Traditional Indian syrup-soaked dumplings — warm, sweet, and indulgent.
